revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=SerComm |model=IP806GA/GB |revision=v1 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/05/2004 |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=OEM |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=P27IP806GA,P27IP806GA-1 |ic_id= |pwr_v=15 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac=true |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Texas Instruments |cpu1_model= |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=1 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=AboCom WMG2400 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip1_model=TNETW1130 |wi1_chip2_brand=Texas Instruments |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} "MADE IN TAIWAN" and "4900MV10" (or something like that) is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
The wireless module would appear to be some revision of the [[AboCom WMG2400]].
Default credentials are from the FCC submitted manual.
